Title: Good Take, Too!
Director: Clement Sze-Kit Cheng, Cho Kio Chong, Heiward Mak
Writer: Clement Sze-Kit Cheng, Cho Kio Chong, Heiward Mak
Actors: Edison Chen, Pei-Pei Cheng, Tien You Chui, Maria Cordero
Plot: An omnibus of 4 short stories, each of them occurring in different corners of our society, but all of which encompass the same themes: courage, determination, pursuance and hope.
